keywords: ['pop song', 'jazzy song', 'male voice', 'piano', 'bass', 'simple percussion', 'moderate tempo', 'happy song', 'choir backing', 'keyboard music']
caption: This pop song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat in common time. A choir sings vocables in the background. A piano plays fills in between lines using jazz sequences. A bass plays the root notes of the chords. Strings and flutes can be heard playing along with the voice on the second bar in an ascending run. This song has an upbeat mood. The theme of this song is about friendship. This song can be played in a drama movie about friends.
